item.title: 5k Plan: (Final) Week 8
item.description:
Weekly Update #4

This was the last week of the 8 week 5k Plan I have been following. The good news, I got my 5k paced run done. The bad news, I am sick/hurt at the moment.

Another week gone by. Some unexpected things came up and I only got to do 3 runs:

item.title: 5k Plan: Week 5
item.description:
Weekly Update #1

It is week 24 of 2020 and today I finished week 5 of the Nike 5k Training Plan I am following.
